summary: The implementation provides a comprehensive labor booking platform with Motoko backend and React/TypeScript frontend. All core requirements (REQ-1 through REQ-9) are implemented, including backend data models, booking system, neighbor discovery, Internet Identity authentication, profile management, discovery interface, booking creation, bookings dashboard, and warm earth-tone visual design. However, the required hero background and handshake icon images are referenced but not actually generated in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Hero background image showing diverse laborers at work in warm lighting (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
missing_requirements.reason: The image file is referenced in LandingPage.tsx but not present in the added files list. Only placeholder references exist in the code.

missing_requirements.requirement: Simple handshake icon representing booking connection in earth tones (handshake-icon.dim_128x128.png)
missing_requirements.reason: The icon file is referenced in LandingPage.tsx and Layout.tsx but not present in the added files list. Only placeholder references exist in the code.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile system separate from laborer profiles with name-only storage
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not specify a separate UserProfile entity. It only requires laborer profiles with name, skills, services, location, contact, and availability. The implementation adds a UserProfile type with only a name field and ProfileSetupModal for initial setup.

hallucinated_features.description: Service pricing system with price field in Service type
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists payment processing and financial transactions in non-goals. The Service type includes a price field (BigInt) which appears to be payment-related.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin token initialization and access control system
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention admin roles, access control levels, or admin tokens. The implementation includes MixinAuthorization, AccessControl, and admin token handling via URL parameters.
